item.title: Computer Graphics
item.description: Grade: 19.9/20 Tools: HTML5, Javascript, Three.js A series of computer graphics demos written in Three.js. Interactive Animation and basic 3D Object Modulation iPerspective Cameras, Autonomous Movement and Collision Detection Materials and different Light Sources Textures, Point Light, Pause and Restart
